title: Socket, early 19th century
description: Candle sconce (a) with detachable socket (b). a: circular, concave reflector made of many small tin discs, arranged around a central cup, in tin frame (painted red) under glass; flat band of tin with nail hole at back. b: arm with single candle socket made to fit into slide at bottom of frame.

tombstone.epitaph:
Socket, early 19th century. Tin, painted in places, glass. 
1941-98-63.
